English:
Oh, [p]! What's up? I didn't expect
to see you here today.
Chinese:
哦，[p]！
怎麼了，要來也不先說一聲……
Korean:
오, [p]!
무슨 일이야? 오늘 온다고는 한마디도……
German:
Oh, [p]! Wie geht’s? Ich hatte dich heute
gar nicht erwartet.

English: WHOA!
Chinese: 嗚啊啊啊啊啊啊啊！？！？
Korean: 우와아아아아아아악!?!?
German: BOAH!

English: Hey, mob-face boy! Who's that?
Chinese:
喂喂喂喂大眾臉BOY！
這位到底是Who are you？
Korean:
Oi Oi Oi 평범얼굴보이!
대체 이 녀석은 후 아 유?
German: He, Allerweltsgesicht! Wer ist das?

English: Huh? What's Jimiken doing here?! Is it really him?
Chinese:
咦……？　為什麼吉米肯會在這裡！？
呃，這真的是那個吉米肯本人嗎？
Korean:
어……? 어째서 여기에 지미켄이 있지!?
그보다 이거 진짜, 진퉁 지미켄이야?
German:
Was? Was macht Jimiken denn hier? Ist er es
wirklich?

English:
Rock 'n' roooooooollllllll, baby! Lolz! Open your
eyes and get a gooood look at me!
Chinese:
Rock'n roll！！
張開You的EYES……好好的看清楚！！
Korean:
롸아아악크으앤로오오오오올!!ㅋㅋㅋ
유의 EYES를 부릅뜨고……자알 보라고오!!
German:
Rock ’n’ Rooooolllll, Baby! Lolz! Mach die
Augen auf und schau mich nur genau an!

English: It's the real Jimiken!!!
Chinese: 我正是……吉米肯大人本人……！！
Korean: 진짜아아아……지미KEN님으으을……!!
German: Das ist der echte Jimiken!

English: ...in the flesh...
Chinese: ……這是一定的吧……
Korean: ……인 게 뻔하잖아……
German: ... Leibhaftig ...

English: What's going on, [p]?
Chinese:
…………
[p]，這是怎麼回事？
Korean:
…………
이봐 [p], 뭐야 이거?
German: Was ist hier los, [p]?

English: Huh?! You want me to cheer him up?
Chinese: 什麼！？　要我鼓勵傷心的吉米肯？
Korean: 뭐어!? 상심한 지미켄을 격려해달라고?
German: Was?! Du willst, dass ich ihn aufheitere?

English: Hang on. Why me?
Chinese:
等等等等，先給我等一下，
為什麼特地要我……？
Korean:
아니아니, 잠깐 기다려.
왜 굳이 나에게……?
German: Moment mal. Wieso ich?

English: I don't anything about his music. I can't do it!
Chinese:
……不是，該怎麼說。
第一，我對吉米肯的音樂
一點也不了解啊，絕對不行啦！
Korean:
……아니 그보다
우선 지미켄의 음악도 잘 모르고 무리야!
German:
Ich weiß gar nichts über seine Musik. Ich kann
das nicht!

English: "Do your best"? Is that all you can say?
Chinese: 所、所以我只說得出「加油啊」之類的話而已！
Korean: 그, 그러니까 그럴땐「힘내~」정도밖에 할 말이 없다니까!
German: „Tu dein Bestes“? Mehr fällt dir nicht ein?

English: Hmph. Fine!
Chinese: ……真是的，好啦好啦，我知道了！
Korean: ……진짜! 알았어, 알았다고!
German: Hmpf. Na gut!

English:
I don't know why you're so down in the dumps. Why
don't you cheer up?
Chinese:
……我不知道你為什麼沮喪，
但打起精神來吧？
Korean:
……네가 왜 침울해졌는지는 모르겠지만
기운 내봐?
German:
Ich weiß nicht, wieso du dich so hängen lässt.
Sei doch mal fröhlich!

English: See, I told you I couldn't do it.
Chinese: 你看，就跟你說不行吧。
Korean: 거 봐, 나로는 안된다니까
German:
Siehst du, ich hab doch gesagt, ich kann das
nicht.

English:
Wouldn't it be better to ask someone who knows
more about him?
Chinese:
……我說啊，這種時候，不是該讓
瞭解這傢伙的人來鼓勵他會比較好嗎？
Korean:
…저기, 이 녀석을 잘 아는 녀석에게
격려해달라고 하면 되지 않을까?
German:
Wäre es nicht besser, jemanden zu fragen, der ihn
besser kennt?

English:
I'm sure he'll be happy if someone complements him
on his songs or something?
Chinese:
像是可以說出「那首歌的那個地方真的很帥氣！」
之類的，能夠具體的被稱讚會比較開心吧？
Korean:
가령「이 곡은 이런 부분이 멋져!」같이
구체적으로 칭찬해주면 기쁘잖아?
German:
Bestimmt freut er sich, wenn ihm jemand
Komplimente macht oder seine Musik lobt oder so
etwas.

English:
I saw some Jimiken fans hanging out in front of
Tower Records in Shibuya the other day. Try them.
Chinese:
前陣子，有看到喜歡吉米肯的宅男們，
聚集在涉谷的淘兒唱片前。去那看看吧。
EnglishCensored:
I saw some Jimiken fans hanging out in front of
Shibuya Records in Shibuya the other day. Try them.
Korean:
얼마 전, 시부야의 타워레코드 앞에서 
지미켄을 좋아하는 오타쿠들이
바글대고 있는 걸 봤거든. 거기로 가봐
German:
Ich habe neulich ein paar Jimiken-Fans vor Shibuya
Records in Shibuya gesehen.

English:
It was nothing. And you coming to me for help is
really cool.
Chinese:
……呃，這沒什麼啦。
而且能夠幫上你忙，感覺也不壞。
Korean:
……뭐, 이 정도의 협력이야 쉬운 일이지.
네가 의지해주는 것도 나쁘지 않고
German:
Nicht der Rede wert. Und dass du mich um Hilfe
bittest, freut mich sehr.

English: Come to me anytime if you ever need any advice.
Chinese:
所以，如果還有我幫得上忙的事情，
隨時都可以來找我商量喔。
Korean:
그러니까 또 내가 의논해줄 만한 문제가 있으면
언제든 찾아와도 좋아
German: Komm jederzeit zu mir, wenn du je Rat brauchst.

English: Don't just rely on Hudie all the time.
Chinese: 不要總是往hudie那跑……
Korean: 후디에에만 있지 말고……
German: Verlass dich nicht immer nur auf Hudie.

English: They're gone!
Chinese: …………居然走掉了……！
Korean: …………벌써 사라졌잖아…!
German: Sie sind weg!
